name: Fossil Hunters
description: A casual action-adventure game about digging for fossils and building your own dinosaurs.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: 2 GHz Core 2 Duo Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 620 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Use a Gamepad!
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64-bit Processor: 2.6 GHz Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon R7 260 / NVIDIA GeForce 660 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Use a Gamepad!
